docs.lead_paragraph: The elderly are less likely to receive follow-up care for mental illness when their out-of-pocket costs are higher than for other medical care.

headline.main: Higher Co-Payments a Bar for Seniors Needing Mental Health Care
headline.print_headline: Higher Co-Payments a Bar for Seniors Needing Mental Health Care
